_header: Mercy is most in my mind
_description: A Song of Mercy — four 12-line stanzas

CULDd564.First Lines:
mErcy es maste in my mynde for mercy es þat I mast prayseMercy
                    es certayse & kynde fra al mischeues he mai me rayseAllas sa lang I
                    haue bene blynd & walked will al wayseMercy wald I fayne fynd to lede
                    me in my last dayse…
CULDd564.Last Lines:
…Til þe Iuge sal I comme bot I wate noght my dayMercy es
                    bath al & somme þar in I trayst & after pray
